text: Jeffrey Katzenberg (; born December 21, 1950) is an American movie producer and media businessman. He was born in New York City. He was chairman of Walt Disney Studios from 1984 to 1994. He also co-founded DreamWorks Animation. In 2018, he founded the short-form media app Quibi. He is a well known Democratic donor because he has donated to the political campaigns of Hillary Clinton, Barack Obama, Joe Biden and Elizabeth Warren. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Disney people Category:American chief executives Category:Democrats (United States) Category:Movie producers from New York City
title: Jeffrey Katzenberg
